name: Cat Cafe Simulator
description:
Follow the slow descent of insanity from a cat cafe employee.

You play as Bob, entering his first few nights of the closing shift at Richard's Cat Cafe. One problem, Bob is deathly allergic to cats... Hopefully, some allergy medicine should do the trick.

As the nights go on, things begin to get a little strange... 

Oh well. A job's a job. 

Be a good employee.
